channel.title: Noble and Aristocrat Rework v3
channel.description:
Note: This should be added at the same time as(or after) my [[color=Lighblue]Mystic[/color] Rework](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/mystic-and-illusionnist-rework-v1/71942). I'll be creating a separate thread for apostle.
# [color=Lighblue]Noble[/color]
Theme: Spying
[details="Abilities"]
* **Passive 1:** Royal Blood- During the election for a new king, votes for you count twice. This passive will be kept even if your class changes.
* **Night Ability 1:** Eavesdrop(Uses: 2 or 3) - Receive the contents of all public whispers tomorrow.
* **Night Ability 2:** Gossip (Uses: Unlimited) - Receive the feedback of all visiting abilities used on your target. May not receive feedback for conversions(But can receive feedback for attacks and evil supporting abilities. Note: The feedback for frames, tailors, and defile should be changed to: "You disguised TARGET")
* **Day Ability 1:** Encode(Uses: 2) - All information(IDK if this is the correct term. This means whispers, accusations of treason, and votes) received by and sent from your target will be hidden for the rest of the day.
* **Day Ability 2:** Transcript(Uses: 1) - Reveal the contents of all previous whispers to and from your target at the end of tonight.(Note: Can target dead players.)
[/details]
# [color=Purple]Aristocrat[/color]
Theme: Applying pressure and coordinating scum
[details="Abilities"]
* **Passive 1:** Royal Blood- During the election for a new king, votes for you count twice. This passive will be kept even if your class changes.
* **Passive 2:** Private Matter - The unseen may talk to each other in a separate chat during the day while you are still alive. (Note: The unseen, cult, and prince chats should be changed so they are accessed and viewed in a separate chat tab.)
* **Night Ability 1:** Recording(Uses: unlimited) - View your target's chat history. Receive the feedback of all visiting abilities used on your target
* **Night Ability 2:** Spy(Uses: Unlimited) - Receive the contents of all whispers to and from your target. Does not count as visiting. Players will remain targeted by this until you change targets.
* **Day Ability 1:** Mental Blur(Uses: 2) - Erase your target's chat history.
* **Day Ability 2:** Crack(Uses: 2) - Reverse the state(not sure if this is the correct term. By this I mean public/private) of information received by and sent from your target. Targeting a player who has been targeted by spy will allow you to select a new target.
[/details]
[details="Changelog"]
* 8/28/18: Created thread
[details="Version 1.1"] * Reduced Intrigue to 3 uses. *Removed redundancy of Private Matter * Gave crack 2 uses [/details]
[details="Version 2"]
* Removed Mental Blur
* Spy is now a day ability
* Intrigue is now one use
[/details]
[details="Version 2.1"]
* Gave Aristocrat Hypnotize
[/details]
[details="Version 2.2"]
* Replaced hypnotize with Recording
[/details]
[details="Version 3"]
* Removed intrigue
* Changed Spy to a night ability
* Spy now does not count as visiting
* Added Mental Blur as a day ability.
* Transcript now resolves at the end of the night [/details]
[/details]

item.title: Noble and Aristocrat Rework v3
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
I get it now, and I would be fine with replacing it with giving the cult death immunity. Do you have any ideas for what the ritualist death by poison effect should be?

Read full topic

item.title: Noble and Aristocrat Rework v3
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Imagine this.

There is two cult and a serial killer who teleported in the castle from tos using magic. The SK stabs cultist A. But cultist B uses the magical shield. Cultist B dies instead of A. All it did was change who died.

Read full topic

item.title: Noble and Aristocrat Rework v3
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
It’s basically a merc shield for the entire cult. I wouldn’t mind replacing it though. Any ideas?

Read full topic

item.description:
RHCube:

Do you remember the old protection for enforcer? It’s basically that.

And it made no sense then too

Read full topic

item.title: Noble and Aristocrat Rework v3

item.title: Noble and Aristocrat Rework v3
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
RHCube:

It’s basically a shield for the entire cult. How is it weak?

1.Someone is going to die regardless and you basically just swapped it to you
2,No one actually likes dying, death immunity would be a much more strategical change

Read full topic

item.title: Noble and Aristocrat Rework v3
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
NuclearBurrito:

Neither of these abilities make any sense

Do you remember the old protection for enforcer? It’s basically that. And I meant to make Corax’s guidance something different(I copy and pasted each class for the format). Here’s what it should be:

  • Corax’s guidance (Uses:2) - Choose a cultist and a class. They will become that class at the beginning of the night.
NuclearBurrito:

Also Ritualist doesn’t have a death by poison effect

IDK what it should be.

NuclearBurrito:

Also a good ability for ritualist is

I like the idea, but that’s a bit specific. Would preventing positive effects instead be fine?

Firelitten:

Why not a 1 use death immunity target, it’s a garbage Ability to save a cultist its essentially a 1 - 1 trade the same as if you never used it

It’s basically a shield for the entire cult. How is it weak?

Read full topic

item.title: Noble and Aristocrat Rework v3
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
RHCube:

Day ability 1: Crimson Shield(Uses: 2)- If a cultist would die tonight then you will give up your own life to save theirs.

RHCube:

Day ability 1: Corax’s Guidance(Uses: 2)- If a cultist would die tonight then you will give up your own life to save theirs.

Neither of these abilities make any sense

Also Ritualist doesn’t have a death by poison effect

Read full topic

item.title: Noble and Aristocrat Rework v3
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
Would this be good:

Vessel

Class type: Special

  • Night ability 1: Initiate(Uses: Unlimited) - Prepare your target for conversion. Select yourself to convert all prepared targets.

  • Night Ability 2: Crimson Blade(Uses: 4)- Kill your target.

IDK how the day abilities should be combined.

Read full topic

item.title: Noble and Aristocrat Rework v3
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
RHCube:

What else should be done then

Give Visser a method of killing

Both the night and day abilities can be merged so there is plenty of potential there

Read full topic

item.title: Noble and Aristocrat Rework v3
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
Yeah IDK how to fix that while still making the cult different from the unseen. Any ideas?

NuclearBurrito:

Doesn’t help with endgame situations like the one I listed above

What else should be done then(besides reworking SF, which already needs it)

NuclearBurrito:

Always having access to a kill is more important than having access to a convert

Maybe initiate could kill its target if it is convert immune? Or something similar to dirty work could be given to the cult and Offering and nightshade could be merged.

Read full topic

item.title: Noble and Aristocrat Rework v3
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
You know how the unseen has it so the assassin can be infinitely replaced and the mastermind is one-time(or at least usually)? Maybe it could be the reverse for the cult. It could have an infinitely replaceable converter and a one-life killer. And are the abilities themselves good?

Read full topic
